alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 9:42PM EST until February 02 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River from Edwardsport to Hazleton. .Minor flooding will continue on the East Fork White at Seymour until Tuesday morning. Minor lowland flooding will continue at Edwardsport and develop over the next couple of days at Petersburg and Hazleton on the White River and last through the week. The crest on the White is near Elliston. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Petersburg. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Flooding affects low agricultural lands, low oil fields and closes Bottoms Rd...Brothers Rd and East Governors Road in Knox County. In agricultural season...farmers are concerned at this stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EST Monday /7:30 PM CST Monday/ the stage was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late tonight to 16.6 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall early Thursday morning. It will rise to 16.3 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Tuesday afternoon by around 1245 PM EST /1145 AM CST/.
